title: Passo Frontè
text:
Passo Frontè (2081 m) is a <a href="mountain%20pass">mountain pass</a> in the <a href="Province%20of%20Imperia">Province of Imperia</a> (<a href="Italy">Italy</a>). It connects <a href="Montegrosso%20Pian%20Latte">Montegrosso Pian Latte</a>, located in the <a href="Arroscia">Arroscia</a> Valley, with Monesi di Triora (<a href="Tanaro">Tanaro</a> Valley).
Geography.
Passo Frontè is located on the <a href="main%20chain%20of%20the%20Alps">main chain of the Alps</a> between <a href="Monte%20Front%C3%A8">Monte Frontè</a> (2152 m) and <a href="cima%20Garlenda">cima Garlenda</a> (2041 m). Near the pass there are some ruins of an old <a href="barrak">barrak</a>.
Hiking.
The pass is accessible by off-road mountain paths coming from the nearby valleys and is crossed by the "<a href="Alta%20Via%20dei%20Monti%20Liguri">Alta Via dei Monti Liguri</a>", a long-distance trail from <a href="Ventimiglia">Ventimiglia</a> (province of <a href="Imperia">Imperia</a>) to <a href="Bolano">Bolano</a> (province of <a href="La%20Spezia">La Spezia</a>).
During snowy winters the pass can also be reached with <a href="snowshoes">snowshoes</a>.
